overview: Michael Sgroe, President and Chief Operating Officer, joined Fundtech in 2000. Before joining Fundtech, Mr. Sgroe spent 16 years at Chase Manhattan and Chemical Bank, and was responsible for developing and deploying high-performance solutions for the funds transfer and cash management businesses of the bank. Mr. Sgroe also served as CIO and vice president of technology and operations for the e-procurement solutions provider Intelisys, an e-commerce startup with 50% ownership by Chase Manhattan Bank. He began his career in 1979 at Morgan Guaranty Trust, where he held technology assignments both in New York and in London.
